  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.ChatroomManager.blockUsers(List<User>, OnResultListener<Void, MessagingError>)
    Use ChatroomManager.blockUsers(List) instead.
    io.straas.android.sdk.streaming.StreamManager.cleanLiveEvent(String, OnResultListener<Void, StreamError>)
    Use StreamManager.cleanLiveEvent(String) instead.

    Use ChatroomManager.getChatroomInfo() instead.

    Use ChatroomManager.getMessages(MessageRequest) instead.

    Use ChatroomManager.getUsers(int, int) instead.
    io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.ChatroomManager.initialize(OnResultListener<ChatroomManager, CredentialFailReason>)
    Use ChatroomManager.initialize() instead.
    io.straas.android.sdk.streaming.StreamManager.initialize(OnResultListener<StreamManager, CredentialFailReason>)
    Use StreamManager.initialize() instead.
    io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.interfaces.EventListener.onConnectFailed(MessagingError)
    Use EventListener.onConnectFailed(Exception) instead.
    io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.interfaces.EventListener.onError(MessagingError)
    Use EventListener.onError(Exception) instead.
    io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.ui.interfaces.CredentialAuthorizeListener.onFailure(CredentialFailReason)
    Use CredentialAuthorizeListener.onFailure(Exception)
    io.straas.android.sdk.streaming.StreamManager.prepare(StreamConfig, TextureView, OnResultListener<CameraController, PrepareError>)
    Use StreamManager.prepare(StreamConfig, TextureView) instead.
    io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.ChatroomManager.removeMessage(Message, OnResultListener<Void, MessagingError>)
    Use ChatroomManager.removeMessage(Message) instead.
    io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.ChatroomManager.reviveUsers(List<User>, OnResultListener<Void, MessagingError>)
    Use ChatroomManager.reviveUsers(List) instead.
    io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.ChatroomManager.sendMessage(String, OnResultListener<Void, MessagingError>)
    Use ChatroomManager.sendMessage(String) instead.
    io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.ui.ChatroomInputView.setSendMessageListener(OnResultListener<Void, MessagingError>)
    Use ChatroomInputView.setSendMessageListener(OnCompleteListener) instead.
    io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.ChatroomManager.updateNickname(String, OnResultListener<Void, MessagingError>)
    Use ChatroomManager.updateNickname(String) instead.
